definition.de: Rechte, die von allen Bürgern in Anspruch genommen werden können
definition.dk: Individets grundlæggende rettigheder over for statsmagten, såsom ytringsfrihed, religionsfrihed og diskrimination.
definition.en-GB: Rights entitled to be enjoyed by all citizens universally
definition.en-US: Rights entitled to be enjoyed by all citizens universally
definition.pt-BR: Direitos comuns a todos os cidadãos do mundo.
definition.pt-PT: Direitos comuns a todos os cidadãos do mundo.
definition.se: Individens grundläggande rättigheter gentemot statsmakten, t ex yttrandefrihet och religionsfrihet.
definition.zh-Hans: 所有公民普遍享有的权利
